What types of events do you perform at?: We specialize in performing at weddings, corporate events, private parties, and other special occasions. We also perform concerts
How much do you charge?: Every event is different with a range of factors to consider (travel, dates, booking length) so our prices are not fixed. We have booking options to suit all budgets. Get in touch for a quote and we will get back to within a few hours, or sooner if we can!
How do I book?: Send a message via our contact form, or call direct. Tell us about your wedding or event. We will send you a quote. If you're happy, let us know and we will take it from there.
Do you have insurance?: Yes, all of our musicians have public liability insurance (PLI) via the musicians union. Certificates are available upon request.
Do you take requests?: Yes! We love requests, and we love adding new music to our repertoire. We include special requests in every booking!
Will you play outside?: Yes!, weather permitting. It's always a good idea to have a backup indoor plan
How can we make payment?: Bank transfer is the simplest. Payment details will be provided along with your contract.
Can I customize the playlist for my even: Absolutely! We work closely with our clients to curate a playlist that suits their preferences and the atmosphere they want to create.
What happens if a member of the quartet: We have a pool of highly talented musicians, and in the rare event of an emergency or unforeseen circumstance, we will ensure a qualified replacement is available to maintain the quality of the performance.
Do you require a deposit to secure a boo: Yes, we typically require a deposit to secure the date for your event. The remaining balance can be settled closer to the performance date.
How early should I book your services fo: It's advisable to book our services as early as possible to ensure our availability for your desired date. Popular dates tend to get booked quickly.
